for him to say that still a chance for a

Camp was welcomed because there is often
stress and embarrassment for kids who
care for a family member just being with
other kids who are in similar situations
provides relief I'm sure sometimes kids
are like youth carriers little things
you know they make fun of them because
like they have to do extra
